com.douglasjose.tech.csv
Class CsvFactory

java.lang.Object
  com.douglasjose.tech.csv.CsvFactory

public class CsvFactory
extends java.lang.Object

Utility class used to create Csv implementations based in a specific format. Can also provide synchronized Csv implementations.

Author:
Douglas Rodrigues

Method Summary
static Csv createOfficeCsv()
          Creates a new Microsoft Office/OpenOffice compliant Csv data structure.
static Csv synchronizedCsv(Csv csv)
          Creates a synchronized (thread-safe) Csv implementation, backed by the provided Csv object.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Method Detail

createOfficeCsv

public static Csv createOfficeCsv()
Creates a new Microsoft Office/OpenOffice compliant Csv data structure.

Returns:
Csv implementation

synchronizedCsv

public static Csv synchronizedCsv(Csv csv)
Creates a synchronized (thread-safe) Csv implementation, backed by the provided Csv object.

Parameters:
csv - The data structure to be wrapped by the synchronized Csv
Returns:
A thread-safe Csv
